title: Sports and Physical Education Design Using the Constraint-Led Approach (CLA)

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of physical education or sports coaching theories, and ecological dynamics concepts
context.additional_context: Program aimed at strengthening work-related competencies linked to language curriculum/vocational fields, providing flexible learning environments through digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can apply the core principles of the constraint-led approach (CLA) (task, environmental, performer constraints) to actual physical education scenarios.
Evaluate learners' ability to design CLA-based practical environments to solve complex movement problems (80%+ accuracy).
Learners analyze CLA application cases using digital tools and propose improvement plans incorporating peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
